scripts.production: npm run version:bump --silent && rm -f  build/d.min.js && npm run minifyJS --silent && npm run version:add --silent && npm run send
scripts.version:add:
echo "/*! v - $(npm run version:extract --silent)
 * Build time: $(date '+%m-%d-%Y %H:%M:%S')
 */
$(cat build/d.min.js)" >  build/d.min.js
scripts.version:extract: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
